timeline.bodyText: This should have been changed in the session-options.json file and then this .gen.hpp file should have been regenerated by running the generate-options.R script. I'm making changes in this area now so don't worry about it - I'll bump it to 13.
timeline.author: kfeinauer
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -271,7 +271,7 @@ class GeneratedOptions
       value<bool>(&autoReloadSource_)->default_value(false),
       "Indicates whether or not to automatically reload R source if it changes during the session.")
       ("r-compatible-graphics-engine-version",
-      value<int>(&rCompatibleGraphicsEngineVersion_)->default_value(12),
+      value<int>(&rCompatibleGraphicsEngineVersion_)->default_value(13),
